animeDescription: Boku, Otary-man (otaku + salaryman) is a autobiographical manga of the author Yoshitani, who is also working as a system engineer. It's about a slice of life of an office worker, who is a little bit otaku.
animeStaff: [['Ashina, Minoru', 'Director, Sound Director, Script'], ['Takehara, Minoru', 'Animation Director'], ['Yoshitani', 'Original Creator']]
